clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Results After Endoscopic Total Extraperitoneal Repair of Recurrent Inguinal Hernia
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Results After Endoscopic Total Extraperitoneal Repair of Recurrent Inguinal Hernia

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of long-term results for chronic pain and impairment of daily activities after endoscopic total extraperitoneal repair of recurrent inguinal hernia with inguinal pain questionnaire (IPQ).

detailed_description.textblock:
Evaluation of long-term results for chronic pain and impairment of daily activities after endoscopic total extraperitoneal repair of recurrent inguinal hernia with inguinal pain questionnaire (IPQ).
All patients, who had a endoscopic preperitoneal mesh repair of a recurrent inguinal hernia between 1995 and 2008 were prospectively recorded and will be sent the IPQ via mail.

primary_outcome.measure: Pain according to Inguinal Pain Questionnaire Activity according to Inguinal Pain Questionnaire

arm_group.description: patients, who had a endoscopic total extraperitoneal repair of recurrent inguinal hernia between 1995 and 2008

study_pop.textblock: patients, who had endoscopic total extraperitoneal repair of recurrent inguinal hernia at our institution between 1995 and 2008
